#uploding the data
```{r}
library(dbplyr)
ds_salaries= read.csv(url("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DeemAlshaye/Miningproject/main/dataset/ds_salaries.csv"), header=TRUE)
View(ds_salaries)
```


#summray the data
```{r}
str(ds_salaries)
```
#data sample
```{r}
samp = sample_n(ds_salaries,10)
print(samp)
```
#missing data
```{r}
sum(is.na(ds_salaries))
```
#statistical summarise
```{r}
summary(ds_salaries$salary)
```

```{r}
summary(ds_salaries$salary_in_usd)
```

```{r}
summary(ds_salaries$remote_ratio)
```

```{r}
var(ds_salaries$salary)
var(ds_salaries$salary_in_usd)
var(ds_salaries$remote_ratio)
```
